Fresh Tomatoes

A movie rating app that uses tomatoes to rate movies.

Home My Projects Skills Contact

Link to the Repository

Project Description

A movie rating Android app that uses tomatoes to rate movies. It was made in Application Development class in which we followed the Scrum Agile Framework to develop the app.

Technology Stack

Since this is an Android App, we used Kotlin and Jetpack Compose to develop the app in Android Studio.

We used Firebase for storing the appâ€™s data and for the accounts and authorization.

We also used the TMDB API to get the movie information for our app.
